1.0.1.name: wordpress/pledgemusic
1.0.1.description:
PledgeMusic is a platform that provides artists the resources they need to build successful long-term careers. Through our easy to use direct-to-fan model, we've fuzed advanced technologies and social media techniques with decades of music business expertise to create the most effective music fundraising, marketing, and sales tool in the world.

Plugin Features:

  • Connect your PledgeMusic campaign to your WordPress site.
  • Two display options: Sidebar widget, or lightbox popup.

Sign up with PledgeMusic now!

Plugin developed by 45PRESS - a website platform for musicians.
